mandatory.description: The base URL of the checkmarx server.
The user (or an env entry) of the checkmarx user.
The password (or an env entry) of the checkmarx user.

optional.description: The name of the engine to use. If not set, a default engine will be used. Default: Multi-language Scan.
When not set, the default preset will be used
When true, a mocked adapter will be used.
The period time in minutes when checkmarx adapter tries to fetch the result from checkmarx server again.
The timout in minutes when checkmarx adapter will stop communictaion with checkmarx server and return an error instead.
This is a standard value and has not to be set. It is NOT a really secret value. But we made this value optional to be safe in future, if the static default value must be changed.
When true, full scan is always active.
